item.title: ScriptCTF - Vault3 Challenge Writeup
item.description: A detailed writeup for the Vault3 challenge from ScriptCTF 2025, focusing on a Safe Unlink heap exploitation technique.

item.title: Smiley CTF - `babyrop` Challenge Writeup
item.description: Smiley CTF - babyrop Writeup # 0x00 - Overview # Checksec on given binary: âžœ babyrop checksec vuln [*] '/home/delete/CTFs/SmileyCTF/babyrop/vuln' Arch: amd64-64-little RELRO: Full RELRO Stack: No canary found NX: NX enabled PIE: No PIE (0x400000) This challenge is mixture of ROP, Stack Pivot and libc leak.
